name: Nora and the Engraving Studio: The Witch of the Misty Forest
name_original: Nora and the Engraving Studio: The Witch of the Misty Forest
description:
Nora and the Engraving Studio: The Witch of the Misty Forest is a RPG game developed by Index. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Atlus.
You can play Nora and the Engraving Studio: The Witch of the Misty Forest on Nintendo DS.
